item.title: By: H Wellink
item.dc:creator: H Wellink
item.description: Yes the underscore hack IS easier... but it's not valid CSS... This is valid if i'm not wrong..
item.content:encoded: Yes the underscore hack IS easier… but it’s not valid CSS… This is valid if i’m not wrong..

item.title: By: Joen
item.dc:creator: Joen
item.description:
Found this via your ping. Indeed it's a nice feature.
I'd like to also point out <a href="http://www.noscope.com/journal/2005/01/showing-css-to-ie-only-the-underscore-hack" rel="nofollow">the underscore hack</a>, which can be easier to use because it works inline in the CSS.
item.content:encoded:
Found this via your ping. Indeed it’s a nice feature.

I’d like to also point out the underscore hack, which can be easier to use because it works inline in the CSS.
